Post.title: http cache
Post._content:
### 1.

#### 

http response header expires  cache-control ,cache-control

expires 

cache-control 
    
 1. public 
 2. private cache-control
 3. no-cache 
 4. no-store 
 5. max-age=time time



```javascript
Cache-Control:public, max-age=31536000
```


### 2.
#### 



```javascript
Last-Modified / If-Modified-Since
Etag / If-None-Match // 
```

```last-modified``` 
If-Modified-Since304

```Etag / If-None-Match``` EtaghashIf-None-Match304200

Post.title: -hook
Post._content:
## 68vueconfvue3.0vue3.0RFC [Vue Function-based API RFC](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/68477600)[react hook](https://react.docschina.org/docs/hooks-intro.html)2hookhookvue3.0solets begin~ ## hook hookreact > class state React 16.8reactclass componentclassreactstateclass ```javascript class Hello extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {date: new Date()}; } componentDidMount() { // do sth... } componentWillUnmount() { // do sth... } // other methods or lifecycle... render() { return (

Hello, world!

It is {this.state.date.toLocaleTimeString()}.

); } } ``` function componentreactfunction componentpropsstatestateless component ```javascript function Welcome(props) { return

Hello, {props.name}

; } ``` react state16.8hookhook--** class state React ** ```javascript import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Example() { // count state const [count, setCount] = useState(0); return (

You clicked {count} times

); } ``` useStatereactHookfunctionstatesetState(classsetStatesetCount)reacthookvue hookvueconf ```javascript import { value, computed, watch, onMounted } from 'vue' const App = { template: `
count is {{ count }} plusOne is {{ plusOne }}
`, setup() { // reactive state const count = value(0) // computed state const plusOne = computed(() => count.value + 1) // method const increment = () => { count.value++ } // watch watch(() => count.value * 2, val => { console.log(`count * 2 is ${val}`) }) // lifecycle onMounted(() => { console.log(`mounted`) }) // expose bindings on render context return { count, plusOne, increment } } } ``` react hookRFCreact hookreactvueRFChookreact hookhook--Hook React state vueAPI-- value(2.xdata) vue-hook~ ## hook hook-- 2+ - mixin - HOC - slot - react vuemixin(react ), - Higher-Order-Components(HOC) reactvuetemplate, - slot vuereactslot, : - mixin - - mixin; - mixin - HOC - HOC - HOCprops - props - wrapper hell **dom** wrapper hell~ hookfunctionhook 1. 2. 3. this reactvue ## react hook > Dan hook[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dpw9EHDh2bM&feature=youtu.be)[](https://react.docschina.org/docs/hooks-intro.html) react hooktitleclass component ```javascript import React, { Component } from 'react'; export default class MyClassApp extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { x: 0, y: 0 }; this.handleUpdate = this.handleUpdate.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { document.addEventListener('mousemove', this.handleUpdate); } componentDidUpdate() { const { x, y } = this.state; document.title = `(${x},${y})`; } componentWillUnmount() { window.removeEventListener('mousemove', this.handleUpdate); } handleUpdate(e) { this.setState({ x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY }); } render() { return (
current position x:{this.state.x}, y:{this.state.y}
); } } ``` [](https://codesandbox.io/s/xenodochial-butterfly-gzflh) hook ```javascript import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; // hook useMousePostion const useMousePostion = () => { // hookuseStatestate const [postion, setPostion] = useState({ x: 0, y: 0 }); function handleMove(e) { setPostion({ x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY }); } // useEffectclass // useEffect(() => { // componentDidMount componentDidUpdate window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMove); document.title = `(${postion.x},${postion.y})`; return () => { // returnfunction componentWillUnmount window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMove); }; // [] depsreacthookdepsobject.is // renderpostion }, [postion]); // postion return~ return postion; }; export default function App() { const { x, y } = useMousePostion(); // postion return (
current position x: {x}, y: {y}
); } ``` [](https://codesandbox.io/s/hookdemo-8zxh2) hookpositionhook--useMousePostion postionclass react hook - [](https://react.docschina.org/docs/hooks-overview.html) - [Danhook](https://overreacted.io/zh-hans/a-complete-guide-to-useeffect/#tldr) hookredux[****](https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-redux-zvx57)[](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-hooks-fetch-data/) ## vue hook > [](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/hBqu1A3gIwMVglb-ZWp8oA) vue3.0demo ```javascript import { value, computed, watch, onMounted } from 'vue' function useMouse() { const x = value(0) const y = value(0) const update = e => { x.value = e.pageX y.value = e.pageY } onMounted(() => { window.addEventListener('mousemove', update) }) onUnmounted(() => { window.removeEventListener('mousemove', update) }) return { x, y } } // const Component = { setup() { const { x, y } = useMouse() // const { z } = useOtherLogic() return { x, y, z } }, template: `
{{ x }} {{ y }} {{ z }}
` } ``` useMousevaluesetup(hook)return3.0 api[](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/68477600) ## same & diff Point 2hook 1. Same Point: - 2thisfunctionthis - 2. Diff Point: **** react hookrenderhooks ```javascript function App(){ const [name, setName] = useState('demo'); if(condition){ const [val, setVal] = useState(''); } } ``` hooknexthookifreacthook vue hooksetupreactrenderrenderhooksreactvueproxydatafunctiontemplatereact reactuseCallbackuseMemohookvuereact hook > 1. JavaScript > 2. > 3. GC > 4. useCallback > 5. useEffect/useMemo/useCallback Vue vuereactreact hook~ ## 1. function component functionTS; 2. react hookvuevuereact; 3. hook[SwiftUI-Hooks](https://github.com/unixzii/SwiftUI-Hooks), [flutter_hooks](https://github.com/rrousselGit/flutter_hooks)... > vue3.0
